de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.result.textwriter

Class TextWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.result.textwriter.TextWriter

  • public class TextWriter
extends Object
    Class to write a result to human-readable text output. Note: these classes need to be rewritten. Contributions welcome!
    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
